section.title: Reason for Referral
section.text: Crushing central chest pain on exertion. Lasts for 5 minutes relived immediately by GTN. 6 occurrences in the last 2 weeks.

section.title: Relevant History
section.text: Previously fit and well. Smoker average of 15 per day since 1956 Father died of heart attack at age 52 (in 1949).

tr.td: Abnormal - significant ischaemic changes in antero-lateral leads.

list.item: Chest pain advice leaflet given and explained

item.content: Cardiac Angiography – scheduled for 2 weeks hence (20-May-06 10:00)
